TopicTitle: Industrial Flames & Explosions, Inc. - Version 1.4.2 Now Available!

Articles.Content:
The saved ones that come with it, the ones with the big top, always fold over and explode when i launch. :\'(

If you can\'t launch it manually, try MechJeb, it helps a lot with this pack.
MAKE MOAR ROCKETS!

My one suggestion is to downscale the rockets. The SAS and Mechjeb have a harder time keeping heavier, more powerful rockets on target. It would be reasonable to do a 10% scale down on things like fuel consumption, weight, fuel amount, and thrust. This would make it much easier to control while still being able to reach the moon and other destinations.
Can we expect a delta II style rocket soon?

Can we expect a delta II style rocket soon?

This pack hasn\'t been updated for a good while now.
Hey Jordan, are you busy? Can you help you (or someone) with the textures of our Konstellation program? (Link in the sign

When I try to unzip the file, it says:

'Unable to unarchive 'IFE v1.4.2.zip' into ____.

(Error 1 - Operation not permitted.)

What does this mean? Is it because I\'m not authorized in your dropbox?
Soooo..... anything new inbound?

When I try to unzip the file, it says:

'Unable to unarchive 'IFE v1.4.2.zip' into ____.

(Error 1 - Operation not permitted.)

What does this mean? Is it because I\'m not authorized in your dropbox?

You\'re probably trying to extract it to a location on your (windows 7?) system where the operating system doesn\'t allow you to do so. Try another location, 'My documents' f.e. or logon to your system as administrator.

You\'re probably trying to extract it to a location on your (windows 7?) system where the operating system doesn\'t allow you to do so. Try another location, 'My documents' f.e. or logon to your system as administrator.

I\'m on a Mac and im just trying to extract it to my documents. I\'ve never encountered an error like this before. I\'ll just send it over to my pc and bring back the extracted files. Hopefully that\'ll help.

Thanks

Overengineering....

I used 8 SRBs and the SRS engine and tank and accidentally flew out of earth orbit without using any of the second stage!
Hey Jordan, any word on a new version for .16? Also, any other designs, and if you do have any, how are they coming along?
Considering his last post was March 22nd this year, and his last activity on the forums July 7th... I wouldn\'t hold my breath.
I could try to update the parts later on if he doesn\'t.

I could try to update the parts later on if he doesn\'t.

That would be awesome! Just know what kind of thing you\'re getting into (I think). I\'m pretty sure if you tweak size, you\'d have to tweak the weight, and on the Intrepid V and SLS, that would be a beotch to do. You\'d have to tweak thrust/weight, and with the SLS, that\'s gonna be a tall order. Also, if you update the pack, could you add some satellites or probes or other cargo? Maybe the cargo variant of the Altair? And make sure it doesn\'t tip the rocket uncontrollably during flight.

That\'s the cargo variant, looks cool, right?

Anyway, if you do, thanks! It would be a sad day for everyone here if this pack were dead :\'(
For now you can at rescaleFactor = 2.5 to the part.cfg of every part. If you do that the SLS will look something like this:

For now you can at rescaleFactor = 2.5 to the part.cfg of every part. If you do that the SLS will look something like this:

I second this...bigger isn\'t always better, but IFE first attracted me for its monster delivery options. Just make sure to adjust the thrust and fuel capacity accordingly!
time to update to .16!!!!

time to update to .16!!!!

This is the most assholish way to ask for a mod to be updated.

Make sure to take notes, everybody. There will be a quiz later on.
I would love for this awesome mod to be updated to 0.16 as well. I know it\'s probably a lot of work, but it would be worth it.

I would love for this awesome mod to be updated to 0.16 as well. I know it\'s probably a lot of work, but it would be worth it.

I second that. Although i cannot fault Novapunch, this is my preferred mod.
And we can always use more EVA-capable command pods (especially 1.75m ones!). We\'ll have to be patient in the meantime.

Indeed, if we all stand by and wait we will soon be showered in cool mods, in the mean time you could check out the smaller names that seem to be quick to the draw in updating although Novapounch and this are timeless. But think about it? as the game evolves so will the mods and soon enough you will be walking your kerbal out and repairing that wobbly RCS unit, or docking your IFE ship with your novapounch built space station, turning on your lights powered by solar cells and scanning weird planets and moons far far away with your satellite. It is endless and all we need is to wait and it\'ll be here when it\'s time is due

Keep up the good work everyone, not just this moder or any mods but the whole community because together this will becoming something awesome.~ well awesom-er
How \'bout now? Also, could someone try to contact him directly? I think it would be much easier to find out if he is updating or not.

does the current version 1.4.2 work on ksp .16?

as when i load a ship it says something not with current version?
